title: What was Ariana Grande’s best song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hmm she is very talented and has a lot of amazing songs. Some of her big hits include Problem, thank u next, 7 rings, side to side, and there are a bunch more. I love all her songs but my favorite is definitely thinkin bout you from her Dangerous Woman album and One last time from my everything album. I can't choose one!!There is no best song since everybody has there own opinion but I would say Thinkin bout you and One last time is her best song.

Hmmmmm, not terribly familiar with the bulk of her music and no time to listen to it currently so going to roll with the one song but it also has Jessie J and Nicki Minaj “ Bang Bang” Great song.  Enjoy.
